```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(primer.data)
```

```{r}
set.seed(10)

x <- nhanes |> 
  filter(age >= 18) |> 
  select(height, sex) |> 
  drop_na() |> 
  slice_sample(n = 50, by = sex)
```

Men and women have different average heights. We analyze this using data from the National Health and Nutrition Examination Survey. Because this survey is voluntary, there may be a potential bias or uncertainty.
